name: Unluckiest Ruins
description:
Unluckiest Ruins is a 2D platform game where you play as an archaeologist who just discovered the ruins of an ancient civilization.

The structure has remained in place for thousand of years, but you are the unluckiest archaeologist ever, and it will surely collapse as soon as you touches.

Try to reach the end of the level without it falling apart beneath your feet.

Unluckiest Ruins was created in one week for the Low Stakes High-Rolling 2 Game Jam

Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move, Spacebar or Z to jump.
